MICRO
 c BOOTSTRAP
m00 0000000000011100001100001001000111010111	SW+0->PC,MAR
m01 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c LOADBR #K
m02 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m03 0000000000011100001100000011000110011101	MDR+0->BR
m04 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m05 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c LOADSP #K
m06 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m07 0000000000011100001100000001000110011101	MDR+0->SP
m08 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c LOADLR #K
m0a 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m0b 0000000000011100001100000111000110011101	MDR+0->LR
m0c 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c PUSH $K
m0e 0000000000000100100101110001000110111111	SP-LR->NOP ,MSTATUS
m0f 0010101101110100001110011001010111011110	BRmacroZ[setZ],PC+1->PC , MAR(+5)
m10 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101	MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m11 0000000000011100001100001011000110011101    MDR+0->X
m12 0000000000010100101100010001010111011110    SP-1->SP,MAR
m13 0000000000010000000110110000000000010100    X+0->NOP,MWE
m14 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m15 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c POP $K
m16 0000000000000100100100010011000110111111    BR-SP->NOP ,MSTATUS
m17 0100101101011100000100000000010010011110	BRmacroN[setN],0+1--> NOP(+9)
m18 0000000000001100000100000001000111011111    SP+0->NOP,MAR
m19 0000000000011100001100001011000110011101    MDR+0->X
m1a 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m1b 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101	MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m1c 0000000000010000000110110000000000010100	X+0->NOP,MWE
m1d 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110	SP+1->SP
m1e 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m1f 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
m20 0000000000010100001110011001100111011110	[setZ]:PC+2->PC,MAR	
m21 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c ADD
m22 0000000000010100001100011011010110011110	SP+1->X
m23 0000000000000100100110110011000110111111	BR-X-> NOP,MSTATUS
m24 0010101101011100000100000000010010011110	BRmacroN[setN],0+1->NOP(+5)
m25 0000000000001100000100000001000111011111	SP+0->NOP,MAR
m26 0000000000011100001100001011000110011101	MDR+0->X
m27 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110	SP+1->SP,MAR
m28 0000000000010100000110110000000000011101	MDR+X->NOP,MWE
m29 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m2a 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)
 c SUB
m2b 0000000000010100001100011011010110011110	SP+1->X
m2c 0000000000000100100110110011000110111111	BR-X-> NOP,MSTATUS
m2d 0010101101011100000100000000010010011110	BRmacroN[setN],0+1->NOP(+5)
m2e 0000000000001100000100000001000111011111	SP+0->NOP,MAR
m2f 0000000000011100001100001011000110011101	MDR+0->X
m30 0000000000010100001100010001010111011110	SP+1->SP,MAR
m31 0000000000010101000110110000000000011101	MDR-X->NOP,MWE
m32 0000000000010100001110011001010111011110	PC+1->PC,MAR
m33 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000	NEXT(PC)

MAPPER
m00 02 LOADBR #K
m01 06 LOADSP #K
m02 0a LOADLP #K
m03 0e PUSH $K
m04 16 POP $K
m05 22 ADD
m06 2b SUB
m07 33 HALT 

MAIN
m00 00	LOADBR #K
m01 28
m02 01	LOADSP #K
m03 29	
m04 02	LOADLR #K
m05 21	
m06 03  PUSH $K
m07 1d	
m08 03  PUSH $K
m09 1b	
m0a 03	PUSH $K
m0b 1c
m0c 06	SUB
m0d 05	ADD
m0e 04	POP $K	
m0f 1a	
m10 07	HALT
m11 00
m12 00
m13 06
m14 86
m15 cd
m16 1a
m17 02	
m18 22
m19 00
m1a 00	W
m1b 10	X
m1c 22	Y
m1d 28	Z
m1e 00
m1f 00	
m20 00
m21 00	<--LR
m22 00
m23 00
m24 00
m25 00
m26 00
m27 00
m28 00	<--BR
m29 00	<--SP
